title: Group iron platelegs

properties.name: description
properties.value: Group iron platelegs are obtainable only by players who chose to be a standard group ironman in Group Ironman game mode. It is obtained by using the Armour right-click option on the Group Iron tutor. It has equivalent stats to iron platelegs.

Group iron platelegs are obtainable only by players who chose to be a standard group ironman in Group Ironman game mode. It is obtained by using the Armour right-click option on the Group Iron tutor. It has equivalent stats to iron platelegs.

'''Group iron platelegs''' are obtainable only by players who chose to be a standard group ironman in [[Group Ironman]] game mode. It is obtained by using the ''Armour'' right-click option on the [[Group Iron tutor]]. It has equivalent stats to [[iron platelegs]].
